#n, k0
{2, 3}
#Integrated cross section, s = sign(k0), m = |k0|; {s*(m-2), -s(m-1), sm, -s(m+1), s(m+2)}
{1, 1, 6, 1, 1}
#coefficients 5x5 table, rows and column index refer to the same kappa as the column index for the integrated cross section
